Text.Page:
Okay, the next step here is going to be {@LinkCreature:5#20#Raguga}. This could very well be the key to breaking down the tuwangis.

Do you still need fancy talk or can you just go take care of it? Seems like you'd have the drill by now.
Finally! This should be the end of our fighting with the tuwangis! You have truly helped us out a great deal. Thank you so much.

Is he still standing?

Maybe you needed the fancy words after all.
